free_text.Learning outcomes: Introduction to the fundamentals of food chemistry.
free_text.Content: [li] Knowledge of the properties, the functionality and specific reactions of the important food constituents: water, proteins, carbohydrates and lipids[br/][br/][li] Essential nutriments (vitamins, minerals)[br/][br/][li] Additives[br/][br/][li] Toxic components[br/][br/][li] Food authenticity assessments and frauds identification
